website_summaries.verdict: If you're in the market for a variety of weights in a kit that doesn't take up much room, this set is worth a close look.
pros: Offers a fast, easy setup and a no-frills design
cons: The paint is prone to chipping, but scrubbing the dumbbells before use often resolves this problem

customer_reviews.title: Same function as bowflex for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I was on the verge of buying the $300 bowflex dumbell set, but I'm glad I took a chance on these instead! They have the exact same weight range in the exact same increments as the bowflex but you save $200! They're also very sturdy which could be an improvement over the bowflex also (I'd read complaints about plastic parts breaking on those). The only disadvantage is that it does take a little longer to switch weights, but not enough to throw off my 30 minute lifting routine, and especially worth it considering the cost savings. I read some helpful reviews that convinced me to buy these and I hope this review does the same for someone else!
customer_reviews.author: rocket.S.625

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good set of dumbells
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good set of dumbells, the only small details are the little rubber rings that are on the bar and on the screw, they can fall off easily, but I did receive extra rubber rings, and the other detail is the bar being rough on your hands, you might want to buy some work out gloves. Beside those small details, it's a A+ in my books.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nahun

customer_reviews.title: best set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: they do ship this in two different packages and when i received only one i was understandably upset. luckily customer service contacted me pretty quickly and let me know about the other package. came about a week later. that is really the only hassle. aside from that, the set is incredibly sturdy and great! the knurl in the grips is very very course. which is great in case your hands get sweaty youll still be able to grip them. have no complaints with it. they even included extra rubber seals for the locking wheels. they arent small, they are pretty long but this is an easy work around. easily the best set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: daniel diaz

customer_reviews.title: Wysiwyg
customer_reviews.text: In a time of quarantine with tons of price gouging, these weights are incredibly reasonable in their pricing. You get exactly what's offered, basic weights with screw on caps to hold them in place, both have enough weights to go up to 52.5. There is always the option to purchase 10 lb plates to substitute out the 5 lb to increase the weight if need be. I am incredibly happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mills

customer_reviews.title: More than you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived a WEEK ahead of the shipping estimate. I haven't weighed the pieces yet but assuming they are all the correct weight this set is flawless. There are no harmful chemicals in the paint (none stated on the packaging). The grip on the handles are great. The diameters of the plate's centers and the handles match the dimensions of other 1" equipment I own. And everything seems nice and durable. I managed to order these when the price was low but I've been watching this page for a while afterward. The price seems to change wildly, so be quick to get it when it's right! I paid around 80.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of dumbbells for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting back into strength training and I'm so happy with these dumbbells. They are solidly made and I believe will be useful for a long time. They did have a slight smell, like some stated in other reviews, but I think it's just the coating or paint on the plates. It dissipates quickly. I don't notice it anymore and it wasn't unpleasant. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GemdreamerTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good Adjustable DBs
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable DBs are hard to come by now, but these are solid. Good price - good quality. The weights will come loose quite often, but tightening it up isn’t a big deal, just a little annoying. Overall, SIGNIFICANTLY cheaper than Bowflex/other products out there, so I’m happy with it. Shipping was a bit of a disaster - came in 2 shipments & arrived a bit later & beat up from USPS Flat Rate Boxes
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: The bar is not comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: So aside from how the bar would tear your hand up after a set, the weight it self is not balanced somehow. At the gym for example I can comfortably curl 35-40 pounds, with this I can do 25-30 and my form would be horrible. The bar is almost too long to hold, compared to the other weights so the balance is thrown off. My friend who is a straight up body builder just borrowed these because of the quarantine and he also said the same thing. So I would definitely avoid these. Are they 1/5? no, but a 3/5 is just being generous.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've used them for about 2 months and have been extremely happy with my purchase! The only problem that I've had is that the star lock can come a little bit loose during your excercise, causing the weights to rattle a little bit. It doesn't loosen enough to cause any real problems though. If it happens during a set, I can still finish the set and just tighten the lock while I'm resting between sets.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Only got half of what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Seller informed me that the second part if my shipment was in route. Only came with 1x52.5 lb set instead of the full 105 lb set. Will upgrade my review after I receive the other half of my order.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Scratched up but it does its job well
customer_reviews.text: There's plenty of scuffs and scratches but nothing very major. The weights are weighed pretty accurately, does what dumbbells do. Didn't take too long to arrive either.
customer_reviews.author: Jagvir

customer_reviews.title: Not what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Package came with only half the weights. Order says 105LBS and I only got 52.5 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Received both dumbbells finally
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set of 52.5lb dumbbells over the weekend and received one of them today (Thursday). Not sure why I only received one dumbbell, but I have emailed the seller and am currently waiting for a response. The quality of this one dumbbell is great, but I will not give five stars unless I receive the second dumbbell. Update I received the second dumbbell the following week.
customer_reviews.author: Trey casper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product backed by great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Adjustable Cast Iron Dumbbells for my boyfriend. At first I was concerned because the product description stated two (2) dumbbells and total weight of 105 lbs and what came seemed like we were missing weights. I contacted the company and they responded and explained right away the weight for the set includes the weight of the dumbbells as well. Their service and response is completely matched by the quality of the product itself. We are extremely happy with the product. Very well made and solid. I will absolutely purchase them again for my boys.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. My order arrived in two boxes in perfect condition, the weights were well packed in heavy cartons, and strapped for strength. I am well pleased with the excellent quality of this dumbbell set; the plate castings are perfect. The bars and collars are very well machined and of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Value for money dumbells
customer_reviews.text: Pros : Good Quality Solid weights Value for money Cons: 1. Unscrewing and adding plates takes a overhead of 1 to 1.5 mins which is a little too much if you workout with increasing / decreasing weight reps/sets. Tip: Try to max out the reps with the same set of weights 2. A little to bulky in structure. Not a great problem of course. But its not as elegant as fixed weight dumbells / hex dumbells. 3. Star screw sometimes loosens up if you are into intense dumbell movements . Not a great problem. Overall 4/5 considering the pros & cons. Great budget dumbells.
customer_reviews.author: B Naveen Kumar Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The only thing that bugs me is that I can't lay the end on my leg before I list it up to my shoulders like you can with fixed weight dumbbells (because the bar point hurts). I've managed to workaround by turning my hand, but it's annoying. It would be cool if they sold a screw on cap that made the end flat. Anyway, glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: The Mascot Army

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and good quality
customer_reviews.text: These weights are great quality and fast shipping! Lifesaving during this time when all the gyms are closed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KURT R. BROWER

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set for working out at home. It came in two boxes and was heavy. The set was in great condition when it arrived. Putting the weights on and tightening then down is no problem. When you are lifting, occasionally check to make sure the weights are still on tight. These weights have kept me in shape and tone.
customer_reviews.author: ski

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best barbells
customer_reviews.text: Confined to quarters, I was looking for an alternative to going to my gym. I took a chance with these barbells on Amazon AND I COULD NOT BE HAPPIER WITH MY PURCHASE!!!!!!! They are sturdy and engineered to perfection. Thank you, Amazon, for delivering these barbells in these dire circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Basick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty decent for the price. A little smelly when opened, but that only lasted a few days. They're fairly accurate: +-0.25 lb. I would definitely buy these again. If you don't know how to properly tighten the spin locks on a pair of adjustable DBs, please do yourself a favor and watch this video or any other video on YouTube that discusses this type of product. The following video isn't mine, but the first one I found that plainly describes how -
customer_reviews.author: W. K.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived 2 days earlier than predicted, so that's a bonus. The weights themselves were in good condition, although they were a little dirty and needed wiping off (not that big of a deal in my opinion). The bars are sturdy and the nut/thread mechanism holds well and is easy to take on and off. My only complaint is that it can be tedious changing the weight in between each exercise, but this is something that I expected when I made this purchase and I think it is inevitable with an adjustable set. Overall this product was a good investment for me and saved me money over buying many individual dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Managed to snag these before they went out of stock again (especially considering current circumstances). Good enough quality and versatility to go about the usual dumbbell exercises, and they're decently priced. Personally, I'm a fan of these adjustable weights so you don't have to have stands of differently weighed dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Jaren

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap set of weights.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new set of dumbells for me and my youngest son. Good price on the weight and fit and finish of the product. Only iffy part was the rubber seals, they do send plenty of replacements, just hate having to reseat them all the time. Super glue will probably be used in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great value: well made
customer_reviews.text: These are cast iron weights so they take up little room and will last forever. I was impressed by the dumbbell bar because it’s high quality machined steel and won’t ever develop rough spots. That’s important because you have to screw on the fasteners when you change weights and you don’t ever want the fasteners to stick. It takes a little time to get used to the weight changing process, but after that it’s no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jarocki

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for a Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: I needed some free weights to use at home and I thought plates like this would take up less room than having a bunch of hand weights of various sizes. I was right they do. The rubber stoppers that go in between the plates and the bars are kind of a pain to keep together, but otherwise these are great for working out at home.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Eastridge

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, Good seller, quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: With the risks of COVID-19 I decided to start assembling a personal workout room until there is a vaccine, and I feel safe at the gym. Apparently so has the rest of the world as workout equipment has become the new toilet paper. I have noticed a lot of sellers selling weights and weightlifting at a premium, way over priced. Considering the cost of other sellers products, I have found this deal quite the bargain. It is quality product also, and very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good weights, weird black chippings
customer_reviews.text: Good weights, came packaged good which is a problem with most heavy shipping’s, overall good weights, only problem is some of the black stuff chips off and get on your hands and the floor, good value for money no better weights to purchase for price so give em a try
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for an adjustable weight dumbbell set.
customer_reviews.text: Covid19 is causing all fitness equipment to get crazy expensive. This dumbbell set is about $2 per pound which is about the best price you will find. The item is made in China and appears to be of good quality. I am very happy with my set.
customer_reviews.author: N. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hoome gym
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved them because I now had adjustable dumbbells. Then I realized that after doing a heavier set with these weights, I had to unscrew the sides off and take off/put on weight depending on my next workout/set. While this isn't the worst thing, it definitely is somewhat of a bother. I would recommend this to someone who wants adjustable dumbbells and do not have access to a gym. They're fine for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but one complaint..
customer_reviews.text: My dumbells came in two days, I seriously love these but the only problem is that even though when I tighten the weights in the metal holding the plates in seems to get loose very easily. I hope a plate doesn't smack me on the face
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Between so-so and good.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery-wise, they came in pretty quick and in good condition. The weights themselves are OK; one complain is that throughout the workouts, the weights themselves start to get loose even if they're hella tightened up, so it might interrupt your workouts. Plus they take a bit to set up in-between workouts, so there's gonna be some unwanted downtime. Still, I got what I paid for and they are reasonable for their price. -1 Star due to the loosening issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received these in 4 days from the other side of the country. Everything is well made and I can tell will hold up. Once you put the collars on there is no spinning or movement to the weights. I weighed them and they were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Jjjj

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pair of dumbbells. They're cheap. They work. Nothing falls off. I mean, at the end of the day it's a couple of bars with iron discs, right? The only possible problem with the set is the knurling on the bars. It's pretty rough and hard on bare hands but it doesn't slip. No need to wrap with tape unless you want to work out without gloves. If you have super calluses then even without gloves should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lee

customer_reviews.title: It’ll work but be careful
customer_reviews.text: These work, and for a cheap alternative for your home gym they’ll get the job done. However the collar always comes loose while lifting even without dropping it. Movement alone will make it spin loose so I have to check it every time before each lift.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela A.

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Seller was quick and responsive. Item came about 3 days after I ordered it. Came in two boxes - just be aware. Weights are exactly what I expected them to be. Great for a home gym, especially during today’s climate. Yea, it takes time to switch weights, but unless you’re planning on buying an entire set of dumbbells this is great. I haven’t lifted weights in almost 6 months and it felt so good. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with how quickly I received my package. It's exactly what I was looking for. I can use the plates on my barbell as well. I took off one star because I was trying to figure out how much the bars weighed. They were not the same weight by a few ounces. Not being a pro at this I'm not sure how big of an issue that will be but I am making it work by either using one at a time for both sides or using the heavier one for my weaker side. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The information displayed by the seller is exactly like they describe. They are well built. No issues with the screw collars at all. The knurl is perfect. The weights are well coated. The chrome plating is excellent. They delivered to my door in three days despite that I do not have Amazon Prime and I live 2300 miles from where they shipped from. The packaging was excellent. Highly recommend this product to any serious weight lifter or other. This review is "no BS".
customer_reviews.author: DTW DTW

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The rubber gasket doesn't stay in the screw on piece, just keep in mind you will have to put it back in the channel each time you adjust weight
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great weight but a little bulky
customer_reviews.text: These are great weights and it's awesome that you can change the weight to whatever suits you, but they are a bit more bulky then regular weights. Over all they are great to have around the house to work out with. I would recommend them over regular weights cause it's much cheaper and also takes up way less room.
customer_reviews.author: JWoohoo101

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change out weights
customer_reviews.text: Easy to change out weights. They simply screw onto each end with little effort. The weights are cheap iron plates but everything is very durable. Smaller box than expected when it arrived. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these weights the other day. I was surprised at how quickly they came, although I don't think the USPS boxes are meant to hold 50 pounds each. The boxes arrived a little beat up. Otherwise, these weights are going to be perfect! The "barbell" itself weighs 4 pounds, so I'll have to take that into account, but it won't affect my workouts! I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to spend a lot of money but still wanted to work out with weights. Good value. Only downside is the weights comes loose with intense workout. I'm dealing with it. But wish they didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. My husband and I are avid gym goers and the covid-19 virus has kept us home and unable to go. These dumbbells were not only very inexpensive but they take up little room and are very easy to use. They’re definitely helping us keep in shape during the crisis!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Seablom

customer_reviews.title: Only received one dumbbell and half the weights
customer_reviews.text: I only received one of the dumbbells and half the weights. The second shipment never came. I also did not like the spray paint that was used - it was already chipping off. I had trouble with the return on this as well.
customer_reviews.author: W. Craig Henley

customer_reviews.title: Their customer service is great and quick to respond
customer_reviews.text: They work really well but I received two different Dumbbells. One was longer than the other and just weren't similar. I contacted seller and had to wait a week to receive the new bar, and still it wasn't the same but for the price you can't complain. Their customer service is great and quick to respond. Either way these Dumbbells are perfect, instead of having a bunch you just need these two. Just takes a while to change out weights.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Read the Reviews First, but I like These Weights
customer_reviews.text: Another buyer mentioned the rubber rings that fall out of the nuts that hold on the weights. They're not glued in, which seems like an oversight. I saw my weights were a little weird, and noticed the ring had come out and was now between two weights. Thanks go out to the other reviewer who mentioned that, because I expected it and knew to look for this problem, hence not losing the ring.
customer_reviews.author: time. less.

customer_reviews.title: Dumbells 105lb
customer_reviews.text: A necessity for any household. You MUST have adjustable dumbbells. I also bought the 200lb set. why? Because I'm a beast and like to pick things up! Great set for anyone. paint chips? MINIMAL . they arent rubberized so no matter what brand you get you will always have a bit of debris if you lift like I do and throw these around like a football. This is by far way more cost effective than those Bowflex weights that are just awkward and huge not to mention made of plastic. Dan
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Perry

customer_reviews.title: Decent Set.  As Described.
customer_reviews.text: Decent weight set. Finish could be a bit more durable; basically spray painted. Easy to use. Spin off/spin on end nuts. Timely shipped. Responsible seller. No significant issues. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product and a bargain. No smell at all. A minor complaint is if you don't use much weight on each side, it might take you a few extra seconds to screw/unscrew the fasteners. The textured metal grip is rather uncomfortable the way it bites into your hand due to the heavy weights, but I wrapped them with Wilson ultra wrap comfort overgrip to solve this issue. The grip naturally sticks to the textured handle and it now has a comfortable, tacky feel. Outstanding price aside, this is a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This the first time I found good weights these are exactly what I was looking for if you need to workout for real these are the weights you need .very heavy as you expect these will make you powerfull believe me these will be a dare .
customer_reviews.author: Angel E.

customer_reviews.title: so it would be hard for me to give a bad review. The only reason I didn't give 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect much from free weights, so it would be hard for me to give a bad review. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the general machining isn't great, and the chrome finish also isn't perfect. But for the price, I didn't expect that, or even need it. These are very good as a second set that you keep in your office. I needed to buy an additional set of 4 10-lb. plates.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Ramos

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dumbbell set and a great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dumbbell set and a great buy. Contrary to earlier reviews I read there was not an issue with smell, flaking paint or metal flakes or splinters on the bars. It works great and the only thing to watch out for is the rubber washers on the spin lock collars. Sometimes they fall off but its not an issue if you watch for that when reconfiguring the weights on the bar. It did come in two boxes that were more than 50 lbs. each. I am happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Are K

customer_reviews.title: Great set of dumbbells for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what you thought they were, dumbbells. They are easy and quick to change out the solid plates. I actually trust these more than the fancier adjustable dumbbells out on the market. These will not fall apart and the screw downs are secure.
customer_reviews.author: Franz J. Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I doubt you'll find a better deal for $99. They look cheap but that's what they are - good cheap dumbbells. Paint chips away, chrome is not awesome quality. Washed them to get rid of the protective oil layer that people complained about (bad smell) - not such a big deal. Bought some racket grip tape for the handles because I don't like using gloves. Solves the chrome issue.  I am happy with my purchase. This dumbbells are definitely not fancy, but they do what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: When I first got them they really smelled like spray paint, but it either faded or I just got used to it after a few days. I've been using them for 8 months and they are still perfectly fine other than some chips of paint coming off, which doesn't bother me. I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive option for a young lifter
customer_reviews.text: I think for the money they are a good product. The only issue we have had is with the collar not staying tight. My 15 year old son is the primary user and he is likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Boji Girl

customer_reviews.title: ... but after accidentally ordering 105 pounds I am truly happy for this purchase
customer_reviews.text: At first I must say I only wanted 60 Pounds but after accidentally ordering 105 pounds I am truly happy for this purchase ... Delivered in three days and the more weight , well I do not need to buy more for a while
customer_reviews.author: G.siliezar

customer_reviews.title: They are simple and affordable. I gave them a ...
customer_reviews.text: They are simple and affordable. I gave them a three star because the tightening nut comes loose sometimes. Besides that they act well as dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Product is as good as it gets. Note that the product will arrive in 2 separate shipments which may or may not arrive at the same time. This was clarified by customer support.. very happy overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Packaging consisted of plastic wrap and a cardboard box. Was kinda torn/worn but considering there was a considerable amount of dense mass in the box, not surprising. Even thought the packaging was (understandably) worn, the product was not damaged. All the plates and the handles came out looking brand new and everything is exactly as i expected. Included were some extra rubber O-rings for the screw bits that hold on the plates. Overall exactly what I expected and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Wish that I could do the math - I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish that I could do the math - I have three sets of these now because of the way that they are advertised. No worries though, maybe I can learn how to do curls with my feet.
customer_reviews.author: msaonika

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, could use a little tweak.
customer_reviews.text: They are good and I'm using them a lot, but the only thing I don't like is how the rubber bands on the screw caps come off when I want to change the weights. The rubber band that goes in the caps, isn't held in place by anything, they just fit in to a slot, so they stick to the plates and come off every time I unscrew them. I ended up just taking the rubber off the caps, so not to have to deal with that annoyance. The paint on the plates tends to chip a little, but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Best dumbbells! These will last forever
customer_reviews.text: Best dumbbells! These will last forever. Bowflex dumbbells do not. I researched a lot of dumbbells. These are easily the best dumbbells, especially for the price. I bought them for P90X and P90X3. You will have to add a few minutes to the workout to adjust the dumbbells, but it's worth it for the price and not having to buy a wall's length of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Zach K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase. Just started working out again and this set of dumbbells is perfect for when I can't get to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Beware Missing Pieces!
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are great, however, I only received one set of collars.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Compact and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I need. Compact and very easy to use. The collars spin easily onto the threaded bars and hold the weights securely. There is no chance of the collars coming loose and allowing the weights to fall off. The grip on the bar is easy to grasp and hold on to. The price is right. The bars and weights are clean and shiny, so I'm not embarrassed to keep them in my living room where I can workout with them while watching TV..
customer_reviews.author: A. Steven Porter

customer_reviews.title: These do as expected if you use them, otherwise they sit under your bed and you get fatter
customer_reviews.text: Day 1: These are great Day 2: These are OK Day 3: Skip working out Day 4: Skip working out Day 789: haven't worked out in 785 days...
customer_reviews.author: Levi R. Carroll Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Arrives in two packages!
customer_reviews.text: Arrives in two separate packages! Received the first package containing the first set of 52.5Lbs and two days later received the other! Responds very fast and thorough to emails about order. Item is exactly as pictured, and is good quality not cheap material. Would highly recommend especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: John Crimmins

customer_reviews.title: Wow are these heavy! LOL; ) They arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow are these heavy! LOL ;) They arrived quickly and are exactly as expected. As others have expressed, there IS indeed a paint smell to them but it's not very strong and already seems to be dissipating even after a few days. The extra rubber rings that go into both the collar and the bar are much appreciated. Make sure you don't toss them and remember where you put them should the installed ones wear out.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: What I like is that they are good weights for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying these. I have been using them for several weeks. What I like is that they are good weights for the price compared to others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure which set to buy. I was worried because this was so cheap. I could not be happier. It is exactly what it says it is. Correct weight, shinny bar, solid, easy to use. This is exactly the dumbbell set you want. Don’t be scared. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holtzman

customer_reviews.title: Best starter set for the best price.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for a great set of weights. The threaded ends are long so with 5# plates you can get up to 70 pounds on each. Everyone complained about the smell in these reviews I don't notice it anymore it was apparent for the first day or two, now it's only when I handle the plates. I also bought a curved bar from cap and the plates are great to add weight to that add well. Overall a very good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: The quality of bar and the weights are great. Easily sets up for any weight combination
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly as described on amazon and it arrived on time. The quality of bar and the weights are great. Easily sets up for any weight combination. One thing to note is that the length of the bars are longer than I expected so this is not best suited for aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these. The only drawback I have, although minimal, is the rubber in the screw caps keeps coming off. I assume that is why they provide you with extras. Other than that they are holding up well. No chipping of the plate color (a problem I have had before) and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: rosacandoodle

customer_reviews.title: Gets the jobs done
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. Plates are merely spray painted, so are likely susceptible to rust, otherwise seems like a good product. Comes with extra rubber washers.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner/intermediate weights
customer_reviews.text: These weights are great for beginners. People complain about the smell of the weights but i dont think weights need to neccesarily smell good, i mean your going to get them all sweaty and nasty either way. The paint on them will start coming off as soon as you get them but thats not issue, in fact id prefer these weights have no paint on them. All in all a great buy for the price, definetly worth the buy if your looking for an alternative to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: which was nice. Right out of the box I cut my ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived two days earlier than scheduled, which was nice. Right out of the box I cut my finger on a sharp edge on one of the plates. Also ended up with a metal splinter in one of my finngers. be careful unpacking. Everything was there. Not bad for the price. Just watch out for the sharp metal and have a file and a cloth to wipe down the plates.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Everything mentions 105 lbs, yet i only got 52 lbs and 1 bar.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ettell

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to lifting weights at home with no spare space.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it’s compact compare to having a set. Tho at the gym, I like to do increasing weight reps which you can’t really do with these at home because of the draw back of only having two bars. But over all. Great solution for having no space at home
customer_reviews.author: Derek Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome weights, easy to take apart and add different ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome weights, easy to take apart and add different weight to whatever you want to workout with. Gets the job done for cheap
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Great for home workouts
customer_reviews.text: There's probably not a lot of difference in dumbbell sets, but this one came with enough weights to accommodate any exercise I'm doing. It's very easy to add/remove the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to an entire set of dumbbells!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for your home fitness area. I couldn't justify buying a whole set of dumbbells when I go to the gym regularly anyway. This is a great compromise and the weights are easy to change. I also bought a small weight rack to make storing and changing the weights even easier. The quality is great and I would recommend them to anyone who doesn't have the space or money for an entire set of dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Jim E

customer_reviews.title: Missing items!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only received half my order. I got a set of 2x52.5 lb weights and I only got one set. Everything is great with the one, but I’d like to get the 2 sets that I paid for
customer_reviews.author: Tory Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for the buck, but the screw end piece comes loose often, and you'll need to wear gloves with these, harsh on the hands. Good for a cheap versatile set though, but would prefer something different. Excellent shipping, received perfect to the door.
customer_reviews.author: Source Compile

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my grandson to help with football training at home
customer_reviews.author: BassMan

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fantastic especially at this price. Knurling has a bit of a bite to it, but that is actually the way I prefer it. Checked the weights with a scale and they were spot on. You will not get this quality adjustable dumbbells for a better price. Shipping was far quicker than realistically expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice dumbbells, exactly as advertised. Arrived in 3 days, well packaged. They smell like paint, but not overly so. Each box (there were 2) had a bag of extra rubber washers for the bars and locks. Locks work smoothly, grips have a decent checked finish. Overall, a very good value. I've been using them 3 weeks now and very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 4gentexn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the 1 star reviews mention missing weights and the smell. I got all the weights and extra rubber stoppers. The size of the bars are a bit long but they don’t hit the inner part of my leg like some reviewed. Learn proper technique maybe? Also the ‘smell?’ Very very very slight smell. I have and will continue recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: nice big threads on bar for easy spin on and
customer_reviews.text: real deal for 105 pounds. nice big threads on bar for easy spin on and off
customer_reviews.author: P. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Maximum weight you would need for a dumbbell set. Like the increment adjustment of plates. Spin lock collars hold weights tight with little need for constant tightening. Bought two sets. One for family, another for friend. Neither had strong odor after about a week. Ordering was no hassle. Came to our door within days with standard shipping and in good condition. Wearing them out will take awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice but loose collars
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice set of adjustable dumbbells. extra room at the end of the bar to add weight from the other dumbbell for doing heavy one arm exercises like rows on a bench. The collars go on easy but also come loose easy, but not to the point of coming off- just makes your weights clang when they loosen. Overall I am happy with them. No bad smell or chipping paint like I have read in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Great for home gym. The oil coating doesn't bother me. low non-offensive odor and slight sheen to protect the weights. No residue left on hands or equipment. Comes with everything stated in the description, which is more than enough for both my and my husband's workouts. Easy to change weights and the collars stay secure.
customer_reviews.author: V is Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my purchase and was impressed by how quickly they arrived on my doorstep - three business days (Prime). Good value when compared to the adjustable dumbbells considering how effortless it is to swap out plates on these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Perfect set of dumbells for weightlifting at home. I'd recommend purchasing additional dumbbell handles rather than having to adjust weights every time for different exercises. That's just me. The weights and bars are great quality. I've been using them with the Body Beast Program.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Castilaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fiancée loves them! He's thrilled that they aren't cheap plastic weights.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: The basics
customer_reviews.text: As per other reviews the finish on the plates is pretty poor - in-fact I thought the paint was still wet when I unpacked the boxes as there was a strong smell of solvent paint. The chrome plating is of better quality and the collars work well. Can't complain too much at this price point. I was surprised that the shipping costs were actually higher than the cost of the dumbbells!
customer_reviews.author: N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and "feel"
customer_reviews.text: My first set of dumbells. Highly Recommend, they're great for starting up.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Raith

customer_reviews.title: Great for home.
customer_reviews.text: They are great for a garage- home gym. They can be adjusted from 5 pounds to 55 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: steven mark vasquez

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. They do have a paint smell that ...
customer_reviews.text: After a couple days, I really like them. They do have a paint smell that is going away. I'm not going to be needing to get 50lbs on them any time soon, but they are working great for starting out. I've had/seen no quality issues. Holds weights in place just fine. I kind of like the extra long handle for certain exercises. Put 20lbs on and hold from the outside of the weights, and can do many medicine ball type exercises. Shipping was very fast which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: heather

product_meta.title: Unipack One Set of 2x52.5Lbs Adjustable Weight Dumbbell Cast Iron Total 105Lbs
product_meta.description: This Unipack Dumbbell set consists of a pair of brand new 105lbs (52.5 lbs x 2 pc) adjustable dumbbells (5 lbs x 16pc, 2.5 lbs x 4pc, 1.25 lbs x 4pc, handle x 2pc, collar x 2pc). Not everyone who is interested in getting a better body through strength training has the necessary room in their home for a dozen or more sets of dumbbells. This adjustable and versatile dumbbell kit is small, convenient, and easy to store. You will be able to perform the widest variety of exercises by working out with varying weights. The kit is simply the best and a must have!
feature_bullets: High Quality Cast Iron, Chrome Handles
52.5Lbs Set Including One Textured Solid Chrome Handle, Two Collars(5lbs), Eight 5 Lbs Plates, Two 2.5Lbs PLates, Two 1.25Lbs Plates
105Lbs Set is Two of Above 52.5Lbs Sets;Easy to Set up and no Tools Required
Collars and Handles are Threaded for a Secure Fit; Plates are Made from Durable Cast Iron
Can Be Set Up in Increments of 2.5 lbs (Adjustable from 5 lbs to 52.5 lbs for Each Dumbbell)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
